I am a second year PhD student at UCLA. I've been studying two-party competition in the United States. 

Here's a dashboard looking at [two party competition](https://teitsp-graham-straus.shinyapps.io/party_comp_app/) measured in two different ways - by voteshare (1) and state legislature margins of control (2).
